casebody.data:
KEYSPAN GAS EAST CORPORATION, Appellant,
v.
MUNICH REINSURANCE AMERICA, INC., et al., Defendants, Century Indemnity Company, Respondent. 2018-51 Court of Appeals of New York. January 11, 2018 Chief Judge DiFiore and Judge Garcia took no part.

**583*806Motion by United Policyholders, et al. for leave to file a brief amici curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Three copies of the brief must be served, an original and nine copies filed, and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.
